data.name: $FILE_ID
data.comment: {locked} This is the file ID for this localization file. This string value should not be used or translated.

data.name: allowDebugManifestsTitle
data.comment: The title of a dialog prompting the user if they want to allow potentially unsafe debug scripts.

data.name: allowDebugLoaderTitle
data.comment: The title of a dialog prompting the user if they want to allow a potentially unsafe debug loader.

data.name: allowDebugLoaderAndManifestsTitle
data.value: Allow debug loader and debug scripts?
data.comment: The title of a dialog prompting the user if they want to allow a potentially unsafe debug loader and potentially unsafe debug scripts.

data.name: debugManifestLoadingWarning
data.value: WARNING: This page contains unsafe scripts that, if loaded, could potentially harm your computer. Do not proceed unless you trust the developer and understand the risks.
data.comment: A warning to show to the user when they're attempting to load debug scripts.

data.name: debugManifestLoadingWarning2
data.comment: A warning to show to the user when they're attempting to load debug scripts. {0} is placeholder for "cancel" button as given by debugManifestLoadingCancel

data.name: debugManifestLoadingConfirm
data.comment: Button label shown for proceeding the unsafe scripts loading despite warning

data.name: debugManifestLoadingCancel
data.comment: Button label shown for declining the unsafe scripts loading during warning

data.name: debugManifestLoadingCalloutText
data.value: If you don't know what to do, click here.
data.comment: Text on a callout below the button with the "debugManifestLoadingCancel" label telling the user to err on the side of caution if they don't know what the debug manfiest prompt is for.
